Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{3: 'The pure white world is stable and sweet.'}
{3: 'The world is no longer pale as Wanshi regains consciousness. He realizes he is inside a building.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySandNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{3: 'The surrounding walls are covered with neat and orderly knife scratches as if someone was counting something. However, there are far too many scratches to count now.'}
{3: 'Wanshi tries to send activation signals to his limbs, but his attempts are futile.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Hmph... Guess I can't move.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Right as he tries to assess the damage to his body, his vision is filled with the black hole of a muzzle.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "I wouldn't move if I were you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: '(Seeing as he didn\'t kill me while I was out, I\'d wager he isn\'t a part of the same organization as that "Gear" thing. Maybe I...)', 4: '1'}
{3: 'While Wanshi is thinking about what to say, the old man takes the initiative.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Hey, what the hell are you?', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "You look like a human, but there ain't a single human thing aboutcha.", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "You're obviously a machine, but you ain't acting like those crazy ****ers wanderin' around outside. Who are you and whatcha doin' here?", 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "Choose your words carefully. Dependin' on your answer, you'll either be greeted with a bullet from my gun or a good mornin' kiss.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "I'm just a Construct that came here by mistake...", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Huh? What the hell is a Construct?', 4: '2'}
{3: "And with that, the old man aims his rifle at Wanshi's forehead."}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Don't you know...? It's a bit of hassle to explain. In short, it is a humanoid robot made of tantalum copolymer with the help of a human consciousness module...", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Alright, alright, alright! Enough!', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: '...So, they put a human brain in this tin can?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Uh... I guess you could put it like that.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "****, ain't that some blasphemy. Do humans really wanna run around on Earth like that?", 4: '2'}
{3: "The old man spits to the side and lowers his rifle from Wanshi's forehead."}
{2: '???', 3: "I ain't ever seen any fella like you before.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "...Construct, eh? That's a mouthful. I'll just call you by your name. Name's Arnold. What's your name?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Uh... Wanshi.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Wanshi? ****, that ain't much better.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Anyways, looks like you've seen better days.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "This place has been abandoned for quite some time. I ain't seen anyone alive here in ages. How'd you end up here?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "...I don't remember. I don't even know where this place is.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'All I know is that the mission I was carrying out failed, so I was en route to the evac point.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'And then... I, uh... just fell asleep.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'More like knocked the **** out. Fell asleep my ***.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "You were on a mission, eh...? Lookin' at your gear and nameplate, guessin' you're a soldier?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Don't wanna tell me who ya are? Not like it matters.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "I wouldn't be goin' 'round runnin' my mouth tellin' my life story to folks I just met neither.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Don't mention it. Soldiers are all the same. I get it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Oh... You were a soldier?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'I just know a dumb*** war vet is all.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Sounds like you two were close...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Live long enough, and you'll find yourself a few buddies. Same goes for you, right?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Uh... You could say so.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'With wounds as bad as these, I can hear them yelling at me whenever I close my eyes...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "I ain't no grease monkey, but I can sure as hell say it's a miracle you made it this far.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "If me and my buddy hadn't kept workin' on you while you were knocked out, who knows when you'da woken up.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Just like that, a small round robot appears at Wanshi\'s bedside. Arnold waves to the robot, and it jumps on his shoulder. It seems that this is what Arnold calls his "buddy."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arnold', 3: "We could only patch you up a bit. After all, I ain't ever seen this kinda tech before.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Thanks... But why did you help me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'Tch... Because of a promise I made with that dumb***.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Of course, I got my own reasons. But that's in the past.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Anyways, you're safe for now.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Arnold gestures with his hand and walks over to a corner.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arnold', 3: "You hungry, Wanshi? I still got some canned herrin'.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Constructs can eat. But in theory, we don't have to.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "(Whistles) Ain't that convenient.", 4: '2'}

{3: "Arnold takes out a knife from his waistband and skillfully opens some bulging cans. Suddenly, a strange pungent smell fills the confined space and somehow manages to reactivate Wanshi's damaged smell module."}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Phew... What's that? I think I'd have nightmares if I ate that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Kids these days. It tastes healthy and keeps you on your toes. And to think I wanted to share it with you. Guests ain't easy to come by, ya know?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Now ain't like it was in the past. When I'd eat, I'd set up a table outside and ask my buddy to play my favorite bass tunes.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Arnold', 3: "I'd eat herrin' with crispbread, potato and butter, listen to tunes, and kick up my feet in the evenin' breeze. No people makin' a ruckus and none of these buildings blockin' my view of the sky.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Moonlight and stars shinin' all over meâ€”ain't nothin' like that now.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'After opening the can with his knife, Arnold begins munching on the fish as he reflects on scenes of his past.'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "But thanks to those monsters, it ain't easy findin' supplies and I can't stay out too long.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Oh... Wow. I can't even imagine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Bahahaha! That's normal. A lotta stuff ya gotta see for yourself.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Arnold smiles and puts the last piece of fish from the can in his mouth with his knife.'}
{3: "Just then, Wanshi notices the sphere bot on Arnold's shoulder shutter slightly."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arnold', 3: "Why's there always gotta be problems when I'm eatin'?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'What is it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Ain't nothin'. I gotta go out for a sec.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Really? At a time like this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "You betcha. How else would an ol' man like me still be around?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Arnold grabs his rifle, climbs up the ladder on the wall, opens the closed hatch above his head, and leaves the room.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Well, I guess I'll take this time to...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Right as Arnold leaves, Wanshi closes his eyes and begins to run diagnostics on the extent of internal damage.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Has the damage from the battle and the side effects from the temporary blockage now completely blocked my internal connection circuits? What a drag...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Looking around, a cloud of gray and yellow dust fills the underground space. The only light within the room comes from the beta lamp overhead.'}
{3: 'On one side of the room, parts are stacked on what appears to be a mechanical workbench. However, the layer of dust indicates that these items have not been used in quite some time.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'I wonder if Troy has reached the evac point safely.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After thinking for a while, Wanshi shakes his head and closes his eyes.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Well, looks like there's nothing I can do right now. I guess I'll just kick up my feet for a while...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "I'm back! Miss me, kiddo?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Yawn... Oh, you're back...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Arnold's loud voice wakes up Wanshi. Half-awake, Wanshi barely manages to open his eyes and look in Arnold's direction."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arnold', 3: 'Oof, today took a little longer than usual.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'After climbing down the ladder, Arnold throws his rifle to the side and collapses on the shabby sofa in the corner.'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "I dunno why, but there are more of those damn monsters wanderin' 'round outside than ever before.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "They're wanderin' 'round like a herd of sheep.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Could it be...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Don't worry 'bout it. I took care of them already.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Arnold reaches for his windbreaker, then quickly points his finger out in front of him like shooting a gun.'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'All the top actors used to do this.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Oh... You don't say...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Tsk, you kiddos don't understand why women used to fall head over heels for this kinda thing.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Arnold's mouth curls into a half-hearted smile. He crosses his legs and reclines on the sofa."}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "I wonder if these monsters are actin' so strange has got somethin' to do with labelin' you as some sorta fugitive...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Yeah... I think this place is going to be crawling with danger here soon.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'You leave while you still can, Arnold.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'Who the hell do you think I am?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'Think I can just leave you here in your condition and save my own hide?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "But you don't have to do it for a stranger...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "I don't care even if we just met. I ain't gonna do it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Do you know what it's like livin' in a prosperous and bleak metropolis?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "City-folk turn a blind eye to those around 'em. That's how awful society was like during the Golden Age.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'Hmph. People used to care about each other.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "You won't read about that in those data files of yours.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Changes like that in society can't be recorded in those files with just a few words or statistics.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "I've seen the kindness of humanity and experienced the indifference of society.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'Human society flourished for a time, but then they became indifferent to each other.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "I can't watch people survive in such indifference and selfishness. I ain't gonna join them, and I sure as hell ain't gonna be like them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "But that don't mean I hate humanity. Quite the opposite actually. We can't just give up on others, no matter who it is.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: 'Callin\' it "escaping" sounds nice, but it\'s really just weakness.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "I don't wanna see this kinda weakness in humanity, so that's why I live here alone with my buddy.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "But I still can't sit by and ignore the lives of others.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "So ya see, it's the two of us who are gonna get outta here alive.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "But I know you can't move in your condition.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "So, how 'bout this. I fix ya up, and we get the hell outta Dodge?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Don't underestimate this ol' timer. I used to be a doctor. That's how I've managed to modify this ol' body of mine and keep it up and running for so long.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Arnold walks up to Wanshi and lifts up his coat, revealing numerous surgical scars covering his body.'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "But it ain't easy operatin' alone. That's why I built my partner here to lend a hand.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Arnold straightens out his clothes with one hand and pats the sphere bot on his shoulder with the other.'}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Well then, tell me what I need to know to get up in there and fix those nuts and bolts of yours. I can't just go in blind. I wanna show you my handiwork.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Arnold dusts off the workstation and wheels it over to Wanshi's bedside."}
{2: 'Arnold', 3: "Like you said, time is of the essence. Let's get this over and done with.", 4: '2'}
